For BakRs & CookRs

Baking and cooking are side hobbies of mine, this page was made to host some of my favorite recipes (and showcase the most photogenic ones).

Since this is a data science website primarily, there had to be an R-based theme. Use the categories on the right to look for "CookR" and "BakR" recipes, all resources are cited at the bottom of their respective pages.
